mapper.select: select goods_no as gno, category, pname, price, skintype, regidate, updatedate, stock, status from goods where goods_no = #{gno}
select goods_no as gno, category, pname, price, skintype, regidate, updatedate, stock, status from goods where category = #{category}
select goods_no as gno, category, pname, price, skintype, regidate, updatedate, stock, status from goods where category=#{category} and skintype=#{skintype}
mapper.insert: insert into goods(category, pname, price, skintype, stock, status) values(#{category}, #{pname}, #{price}, #{skintype}, #{stock}, #{status})
mapper.update: update goods set category=#{category}, pname=#{pname}, price=#{price}, skintype=#{skintype}, stock=#{stock}, status=#{status} where goods_no=#{gno}
